H0.text: Which controversial movement was founded in 1928 by the Spaniard Josemaria Escriva de Balaguer y Albas. Opus Dei

H1.text: Which controversial movement was founded in 1928 by the Spaniard Josemaria Escriva de Balaguer y Albas. Legion of Christ

H2.text: Which controversial movement was founded in 1928 by the Spaniard Josemaria Escriva de Balaguer y Albas. Regnum Christi

H3.text: Which controversial movement was founded in 1928 by the Spaniard Josemaria Escriva de Balaguer y Albas. ODAN

A4.text: Opus Dei was founded by Josemaría Escrivá on 2 October 1928 in Madrid, Spain.
